description: Mielle's Rosemary Mint Shampoo is the perfect cleansing shampoo, the mint works to not achieve a deep cleanse but also stimulate your scalp helping promote hair growth.

productName: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Strengthening Hair Masque
description: The Rosemary Mint Strengthening Hair Masque from Mielle works to help heal damaged hair and provide extra moisture.

productName: Mielle Pomegranate and Honey Refreshing Spray
description: Mielle's Pomegranate and Honey Refreshinf Spray is perfect for a quick refresh for your curls, it can be used daily or as need based on your hair type.

productName: The Doux Mousse Def Texture Foam
description: The Doux's Mouse Def Texture Foam is the perfect wash day or roller set foam. It provides a great hold without the crunch and dehydration.
The Doux 808 Base Gel is a wash day essentially that provides definition while also locking in moisture

productName: The Mane Choice Alpha Multi-Vitamin Growth Oil
description: The Mane Choice Alpha Growth Oil is packed with both biotin and vitamin c to help stimulate hair growth and maintain your hair's retention.

productName: The Mane Choice Tropical Moringa Sweet Oil & Honey Sealing Cream
description: Pair it with a leave-in conditioner or use it as is, The Mane Choice Sealing Cream works to keep hair hydrated and leaves your hair smelling amazing.

productName: The Mane Choice Prickly Pear Overnight Mask
description: If your hair needs a little extra moisture this is the product for you, this overnight mask works to not only moisturize but also detangle and strengthen.

productName: The Mane Choice A-MAZ-ZON Hair Day Leave-in Conditioner
description: This leave-in conditioner is perfect for after you cleanse your hair, it is an all natural moisturizer that is perfect for preparing or styling hair.

productName: Design Essentials Natural Almond & Avocado Shampoo
description: This product is a deep cleansing yet moisturizing shampoo, it is sulfate free so it cleanses without drying out your hair.

productName: Design Essentials Natural Almond & Avocado Nourishing Co-wash
description: This co-washing cleanser works great for those who like to cleanse in between styles without going through a full wash day.

productName: Design Essentials Peppermint & Aloe Anti-itch Scalp Treatment
description: This treatment works to soothe itchy scalp, it also contains Salicylic Acid to help control flaking and prevent dryness.
The Tgin Butter Cream is a moisturizer that works to combat dry hair, this product is heavier than a leave-in conditioner leaving hair moisturized for longer.
The Tgin Honey Curls Custard works to create definition after hair has been moisturized, this specific custard is perfect for hair with tighter coils.
Protect your style with Tgin's Slip Free Satin Bonnet, these bonnets protect your hair from rubbing against things and helps to make styles last longer.

This detangling hair brush kit works to ease the tension detangling may create on your hair. With fine flexible teeth this brush glides through hair and comes with a wide-tooth comb and scalp massager.
What good is any style without volume? This Bamboo Hair Pick by Combetter is perfect for creating volume without frizz.
